R

removeAllBars(Player) - Method in class org.stormdev.mc.bossbarapi.api.BossBarAPI
Removes the bars from the given player.
If the player has no bar, this method does nothing.
removeBar(Player, CustomBossBar) - Method in class org.stormdev.mc.bossbarapi.api.BossBarAPI
Removes a BossBar from the player
